text:
*3.* One more thing, we have *media-querie options* for margin and padding on mobile and desktop, but none for *print*.

*Detail:* Sometimes its requeiered to have diffrent margin and paddings for DnD-Layouts that are printed. To preview a Print-Page use 595x842 for DinA4 and Strg+Shift+P > Rendering Emulate CSS print media type (Chrome Console)

*4.* Please remove all the *!important Selector form default Grid* (DnD).

*Detail:* CSS selectors have a hierarchical order. Using !important is always an indicator that something elsewhere  went wrong. There are not many cases for !important. And it usage should be limit to developers that maybe need to overwrite precompiled inline stylesheets. But the HubSpot grid use it lavishly everywhere.

Hi everyone! Now that we have the blog listing editor, it would be great if we can increase the 50 modules limit in a marketplace theme, so we can develop new blog-specific modules and take advantage of this new editor. Thanks!
